articles.author: RFE/RL
articles.title: Wagner Mercenary Chief Prigozhin Says Ukraine's Counteroffensive Is Under Way - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: Wagner mercenary group chief Yevgeny Prigozhin says Ukraine's highly anticipated counteroffensive against Russian invasion is under way, claiming that Ukrainian armed forces plan to move further to the north and south if they take control of Bakhmut.
